verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

רְאֵ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> See קָרָ֣אתִֽי <S%H7121><s%> I have called בְשֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> by name בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <S%H1212><s%> Bezaleel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אוּרִ֥י <S%H221><s%> of Uri בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ח֖וּר <S%H2354><s%> of Hur לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וָאֲמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> And I have filled אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> him with the spirit אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּחָכְמָ֛ה <S%H2451><s%> in wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֥ה <S%H8394><s%> and in understanding וּבְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> and in knowledge וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> and in all manner of workmanship

לַחְשֹׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> To devise מַחֲשָׁבֹ֑ת <S%H4284><s%> cunning works לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to work בַּזָּהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> in gold וּבַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and in silver וּבַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> and in brass

וּבַחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H2799><s%> And in cutting אֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stones לְמַלֹּ֖את <S%H4390><s%> to set וּבַחֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H2799><s%> [them] and in carving עֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> of timber לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to work בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> in all manner of workmanship

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> Myself הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I behold I have given אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלִיאָ֞ב <S%H171><s%> with him Aholiab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִֽיסָמָךְ֙ <S%H294><s%> of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan וּבְלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> and in the hearts כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> of all that are wise לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have put חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְעָשׂ֕וּ <S%H6213><s%> that they may make אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּיתִֽךָ׃ <S%H6680><s%> all that I have commanded

אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> The tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָרֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> and the ark לָֽעֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <S%H3727><s%> and the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> that [is] thereupon and all the furniture הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <S%H7979><s%> And the table וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> and his furniture וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנֹרָ֥ה <S%H4501><s%> candlestick הַטְּהֹרָ֖ה <S%H2889><s%> and the pure וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H3627><s%> with all his furniture וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> and the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> of incense

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> And the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> with all his furniture וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיּ֖וֹר <S%H3595><s%> and the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot

וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֣י <S%H899><s%> And the cloths הַשְּׂרָ֑ד <S%H8278><s%> of service וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֤י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> and the holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> and the garments בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons לְכַהֵֽן׃ <S%H3547><s%> to minister in the priest's office

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֧מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֛ה <S%H4888><s%> And the anointing וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְטֹ֥רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּ֖ים <S%H5561><s%> and sweet לַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for the holy כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּיתִ֖ךָ <S%H6680><s%> [place] according to all that I have commanded יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> thee shall they do פ
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> thou also unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Verily אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> ye shall keep כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for is a א֨וֹת <S%H226><s%> for it [is] a sign הִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּינִ֤י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H996><s%> between לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> between me and you throughout your generations לָדַ֕עַת <S%H3045><s%> that [ye] may know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> that doth sanctify

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> therefore for it [is] holy הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֑ם מְחַֽלְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2490><s%> unto you every one that defileth מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> it shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> for whosoever doeth בָהּ֙ מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> [any] work וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> therein that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִים֮ <S%H3117><s%> days יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <S%H4399><s%> may work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> but in the seventh שַׁבַּ֧ת <S%H7676><s%> [is] the sabbath שַׁבָּת֛וֹן <S%H7677><s%> of rest קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> holy לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> whosoever doeth מְלָאכָ֛ה <S%H4399><s%> [any] work בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> in the sabbath מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death

וְשָׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> shall keep בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Wherefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath לַעֲשׂ֧וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁבָּ֛ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath לְדֹרֹתָ֖ם <S%H1755><s%> throughout their generations בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [for] a perpetual

בֵּינִ֗י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵין֙ <S%H996><s%> between בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> between me and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel א֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> It [is] a sign הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לְעֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> in שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> for [in] six יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> made יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and earth וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> and on the seventh שָׁבַ֖ת <S%H7673><s%> he rested וַיִּנָּפַֽשׁ׃ <S%H5314><s%> and was refreshed ס

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And he gave אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H3615><s%> when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> of communing אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> upon בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> with him upon mount סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> two לֻחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> of testimony לֻחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> written בְּאֶצְבַּ֥ע <S%H676><s%> with the finger אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God
